Class AdminSignupLogin

java.lang.Object
AdminSignupLogin
public class AdminSignupLogin extends Object
The AdminSignupLogin class provides functionality for admin sign up, login, validation, and logout.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminSignupLogin

      public AdminSignupLogin()

  • Method Details

    • adminSignUp

      public static void adminSignUp()
      Allows an admin to sign up by providing a username and password. Checks password strength and creates an admin account file if validations pass.

    • adminLogin

      public static void adminLogin()
      Allows an admin to log in by entering a username and password. Validates the credentials and logs in if valid.

    • adminValidateCredentials

      public static boolean adminValidateCredentials(String username, String password)
      Validates admin credentials by checking against stored username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - the admin username
      password - the admin password
      Returns:
      true if credentials are valid, false otherwise

    • Logout

      public static void Logout()
      Logs out an admin from the system.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method to execute admin login functionality.
      Parameters:
      args - the command-line arguments
